prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The gnomes are equipped with UV LED lights, which activate their glow-in-the-dark feature. This characteristic makes them visually striking, especially in low-light conditions or at night.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Gnomes, UV LED lights, glow-in-the-dark, visually striking, low-light conditions, night
